statements: SELECT * FROM patient_vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE temperature < 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure, oxygen_level FROM patient_vital_signs ORDER BY oxygen_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_vital_signs;
SELECT * FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%130%';
SELECT AVG(heart_rate), MAX(temperature) FROM patient_vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM patient_vital_signs GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE temperature > 98.6 AND oxygen_level < 95;
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_specialty IS NOT NULL;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, last_updated FROM patient_vital_signs ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM providers ORDER BY provider_location DESC;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM providers JOIN patient_vital_signs ON provider_id = patient_id GROUP BY provider_id HAVING num_patients > 3;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM patient_vital_signs;
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE provider_location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialization FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, patient_condition FROM patients;
SELECT vital_signs_id, patient_id, provider_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature, oxygen_saturation FROM vital_signs;
SELECT provider_name, specialization, provider_id FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT patient_condition, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialization FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, patient_condition FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT provider_name, specialization, COUNT(*) AS patient_count FROM healthcare_providers LEFT JOIN vital_signs ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = vital_signs.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name, specialization;

SELECT patients.patient_name, vital_signs.heart_rate, vital_signs.blood_pressure, vital_signs.temperature FROM patients INNER JOIN vital_signs ON patients.patient_id = vital_signs.patient_id WHERE vital_signs.heart_rate > 80 AND vital_signs.temperature < 98.6;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, notes FROM Appointments WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate, temperature FROM Patients JOIN VitalSigns ON Patients.patient_id = VitalSigns.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers ORDER BY specialty DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, VitalSigns.heart_rate, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients, VitalSigns, Appointments WHERE Patients.patient_id = VitalSigns.patient_id AND Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Patients.age, VitalSigns.temperature FROM Patients JOIN VitalSigns ON Patients.patient_id = VitalSigns.patient_id WHERE VitalSigns.temperature > 98.6;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT log_details, log_date FROM TelehealthLogs WHERE provider_id = 2 AND log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC, age DESC
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE location = 'New York' AND specialty LIKE '%Surgery%'

SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, status FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%120%'
SELECT log_id, patient_id, provider_id, log_date FROM TelehealthLogs WHERE log_date < '2022-08-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC
